property.name: accountIdFieldApiName
property.label: Account Id Field API Name
property.description: To inherit and display the icons from a parent account on this page, add the API name of the field that correlates with this record's parent account id. You may go up to one level to the grandparent record, if needed. i.e. Account__c, Case__r.AccountId, etc.
